entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 22.
